definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
Jacques René Chirac (1932-), president of France 1995-2007
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Edison Chen (1980-), Hong Kong singer and actor
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993

sentences.english: Borsig, through a spokesman, declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 博尔西希通过一位发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Can I sit in on your Intermediate Hittite class?
sentences.chinese: 我能旁听你的“中级希泰语”课程吗？

sentences.english: There is also in the Bodleian Library a mutilated leaf of a very tiny Greek MS.
sentences.chinese: 也有在国立图书馆肢解叶的一个非常微小的希女士。

sentences.english: Hernych did create a break point in the penultimate game of the second set.
sentences.chinese: 第二盘的倒数第二局中赫内希觅得一次破发的机会。

sentences.english: Then Gideon the son of Joash returned from the battle by the ascent of Heres.
sentences.chinese: 约阿施的儿子基甸由希列斯坡从阵上回来。

sentences.english: This house finds its place in a big forest of pines, near the beach.
sentences.chinese: 希贝尔塔别墅毗邻海滩，隐于茂密的大松林间。

sentences.english: The Scottish government engaged Libya and the United Kingdom on the matter of releasing al-Megrahi.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰政府也参与了利比亚和英国释放迈格拉希事件。

sentences.english: How else can you hope to get it?
sentences.chinese: 舍此之外你怎能希获得它呢？
乌西的儿子是伊斯拉希。

sentences.english: Proving the existence of the Higgs boson is one of the main goals of the collider.
sentences.chinese: 而对撞机的工作就是要证实希格斯玻色子粒子的存在。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama called last week for Megrahi to be put under house arrest.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统上个星期呼吁把迈格拉希软禁在家。

sentences.english: Higuera started creating the series in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 希格拉于2012年开始创作此系列。

sentences.english: PKC Group has two business areas: Wiring Harnesses and Electronics.
sentences.chinese: 比克希集团有线束及电子两大业务单元。

sentences.english: As an example, the improved Schiffman phase shifter is simulated.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个例子，改进希夫曼的移相器是模拟的。

sentences.english: The last part is the evaluation of Tillich's ultimate concern thought.
sentences.chinese: 最后一部分是对蒂里希终极关怀思想的评析。

definition: used in the transliteration of people's names
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
